book.title: Sought by the Alphas Complete Boxed Set

review.body:
Enticing Read

Well written story line with complex likable characters. Plenty of steamy sex scenes with a generous helping of action. This story is well worth the read!

book.title: How to Perform Under Pressure: The Science of Doing Your Best When It Matters Most

review.body:
This book provides a guide to handling situations when you are under pressure.

I found this book quite inspiring in places but it was too long winded (some of the anecdotes seemed irrelevant) and some of the advice / sections were a bit incoherent, if it had been a hundred pages shorter it could h...

book.title: The Return of the Indian

review.body: favorite of the series

book.title: Journal for Women: 105 Questions for Women with Motivational Quotes: Self Discovery Journal: (Notebook)

review.body: I thoroughly enjoyed this journal. I like that the author added the reasons for keeping this journal and the benefits of writing, I also love the inspirational quotes at the end of the book, that encourage people to think and write about what the motivations mean to them, For me, keeping a journa...

book.title: How to Bewitch an Earl

review.body:
Fun and cute

I love how the book started. You got to know the key players and love them. Even when the truth comes out. All and all it was a cute short story.

book.title: Could be a Crowd

review.body: 1.5 rounds up to 2 stars.

book.title: The Mirror of Fire and Dreaming: Book II of the Brotherhood of the Conch

review.body: fave!

book.title: Spare Change: How to Save More, Budget and be Happy with Your Finances

review.body:
This book provides a straight forward guide to managing your money.

The layout and print quality of this book was very good, but the advice was quite low level / simplistic and would probably only be good for people with very limited financial experience / knowledge.

book.title: Waiting for Clark

review.body: 2.5 rounds up to 3 stars

book.title: Secret de Trop

review.body: J'ai rencontré Célina sur booknode grâce à mon roman qu'elle avait adoré et c'est à ce moment-là qu'elle m'a demandé des conseils pour la publication du sien. Après plusieurs échanges nous avons rapidement sympathisé. Je l'ai ensuite intégrée à mon équipe, comme vous le savez, et présentée à L.S....

book.title: Pleasured by You (Love in the City, #3)

review.body:
*Copy received through NetGalley, courtesy of The Book Enthusiast as part of the #30DayReadingIndie Challenge.*
I did not read the two first books in the " Love in the City Series " books. But that didn't stop me from enjoying this book.
Fletcher Haney and Baylor Jennings had a one night stand on N...

book.title: Forever in Blue: The Fourth Summer of the Sisterhood (Sisterhood, #4)

review.body: .... lot to take in....

book.title: City of Gold

review.body:
A prisoner ends up taking on the identity of an army investigator and searches for a German spy.

The basic story and characters were good, but in places the plot and writing were a bit laboured.

Real rating 3.5

book.title: Silent Kingdom (Silent Kingdom, #1)

review.body: I got a beta version of this recently and I loved it ! Im excited to see any changes and have that beautiful cover in my hands !!

book.title: Brie Pleases Her New Master (After Graduation, #1)

review.body:
Perfect Follow-up

Wonder what happens after graduation? Wonder no farther, thus book perfectly explains the next step in this wonderful story of Brie's journey through submission.

book.title: Ice Station Wolfenstein (Order of the Black Sun #1)

review.body:
Adventure series with unlikely heroes

A depressed journalist befriends a young PhD and the two begin an adventure steeped in history as dark as a pot of tea left on the stove for hours. Hard to put down, plenty of plot twists, and an excellent use of history blended with current events to make for...

book.title: To Dwell in Darkness (Duncan Kincaid & Gemma James, #16)

review.body: I think this will be my last Crombie for a while but I do like her plotting and characters. Just enough excitement to keep the reading interesting.

book.title: Create An Abundant Life

review.body: Short, straight to her points, inspiring.

book.title: L'Âme du mal

review.body: One of the best books i've ever read in my whole life. Absolutely addictive. Once you start reading you can't stop till the last page.

book.title: The Energy Bus: 10 Rules to Fuel Your Life, Work, and Team with Positive Energy

review.body: Very insightful.
